name: CULLMAN COUNTY SHERIFF'S OFFICE
sampleDescriptions: Assist the Cullman County Sheriffs Office to negotiate a new per diem rate for housing federal prisoners under USMS IGA 01-06-0025.
Assist the Cullman County Sheriffs Office to negotiate a new per diem rate for housing federal prisoners under USMS IGA 01-06-0025.
Assist Cullman County Sheriffs Office in negotiating a new higher per diem rate for housing federal prisoners for U.S. Marshals Service.
